name: Physics Sandbox (GreenyOfficialAlt)
description:
Hey, I actually made something high quality! I think. Anyway, in this game, you get to drag cubes around and discover many, many bugs! You can also spawn your own cubes in Sandbox, or play Jenga in... Well, Jenga!

---
If you have any map ideas, tell me.

---
CONTROLS
---
Left click - Grab

Move mouse (With left mouse button held) - Move object

WASD or Arrow Keys - Walk

Space - Jump

Right mouse button - Spawn cube (Only in Sandbox!)
